name: swift-enum
description: A Swift-inspired enum implementation for JavaScript.

scripts.test:cover: babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --reporter text --reporter html $(npm bin)/_mocha test/ -- --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run check
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Chris Sauve <chrismsauve@gmail.com>
